name: Dance of the Poverty Gods
description:
After her sister is possessed, Shion teams up with Sanae to investigate a group of poverty gods causing trouble in the mythical land of Gensokyo! 

Dance of the Poverty Gods: ~How Shion Finally Got a Chance to Try Miso~ is a danmaku game made in 72 hours for the 5th Touhou Game Jam.

Investigate the misfortune in Gensokyo as Sanae in this beginner-friendly danmaku game. Exterminate the villainous youkai. Eat miso.

Features:

  • Some enemies drop coins. Collecting coins builds up the yellow "wealth" bar.
  • Double-press the attack button to convert wealth into a powerful attack that goes through shields!
  • The current version is essentially an alpha release. Many features and balancing will change later.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • Shift to focus.
  • Z to shoot. (Double-press to trigger special attack when yellow bar is at least half full.)
  • X to bomb.
  • F10 to change window size, F11 to go fullscreen.
  • Gamepad is also supported, and controls can be reconfigured!

Credits:

  • Karob - Programming
